meteo.description: csv file containing the meteo input variables

tzone.description: Area/Location timezone according to the Olson timezone database

output_index.description: Index to be added to the name of the simulation outputs folder

hydraulic_structure.description: `true` to calculate shoot hydraulic structure: leaf water potential is calculated and used in stomatal conductance model; `false` to use leaf-to-air vapor pressure deficit

negligible_shoot_resistance.description: `true` to omit shoot hydraulic resistance: leaf water potential is equal to soil water potential; `false` to calculate leaf water potential as part of the hydraulic structure

energy_budget.description: `true` to calculate leaf temperature from leaf energy budget; `false` to set leaf temperature equal to air temperature

soil_water_deficit.description: `true` to allow simulating soil water deficit; `false` to prevent soil water from dropping below a given threshold

spacing_on_row.description: [m] spacing between plants on the same row

row_angle_with_south.description: [degrees] Counter clockwise angle between the default X-axis direction (South) and the real direction of X-axis.

phenology.description: Parameters required for calculating cumulative degree-day temperature since budbreak

t_base.description: [°C] base temperature for cumulative degree-days calculations

mtg_api.description: The labeling required to allow HydroShoot identifying the different shoot hydraulic segments

collar_label.description: Label prefix of the collar internode (required to identify the first segment of the hydraulic structure)

stem_lbl_prefix.description: Label prefices of the internodes, petioles, and complex-nodes resulting from pruning over successive years

numerical_resolution.description: Requirements for the numerical resolution of the hydraulic and energy-balance systems

max_iter.description: Maximum number of iterations (for both hydraulic and energy-balance calculations)

psi_step.description: Reduction factor to the xylem water potential step value between two consecutive iterations in the case of non convergence

psi_error_threshold.description: [MPa] Maximum allowable cumulative squared difference in xylem water potential between two consecutive iterations

t_step.description: Reduction factor to the leaf temperature step value between two consecutive iterations in the case of non convergence

t_error_threshold.description: [°C] Maximum allowable cumulative squared difference in leaf temperature between two consecutive iterations

irradiance.description: Parameters of the `irradiance` module, to be used in the Caribu model (Chelle et al. 1998, Ecol. Model. 111, 75  91)

E_type.description: Unit of the irradiance flux density used in the simulation

E_type2.description: Unit of the desired simulated irradiance flux density output

SW.description: Optical properties in the shortwave band

LW.description: Optical properties in the longwave band

turtle_format.description: Irradiance distribution over the celestial dome (sky overcast or uniform overcast)

icosphere_level.description: The level of refinement of the dual icosphere.

solo.description: if `true` calculates energy budget for each element assuming the temperatures of surrounding leaves constant (from previous calculation step), if `false` computes simultaneously all temperatures using `sympy.solvers.nsolve` (**very costly!!!**)

Kx_dict.description: Parameters of the allometric relationship between the diameter of the hydraulic segment and its maximum hydraulic conductivity (K_max=a*D^b)

a.description: [kg s-1 m-3 MPa-1] The slope of the allometric relationship

b.description: [-] The power of the allometric relationship

min_kmax.description: [kg s-1 m-3 MPa-1] The minimum allowable (or observed) value of maximum hydraulic conductivity

par_K_vul.description: Parameters of the vulnerability function of the hydraulic conductivity

fifty_cent.description: [MPa] Water potential at which the conductivity of the hydraulic segment is reduced by 50% reltive to its maximum value

sig_slope.description: Shape parameter controlling the slope of the S-curve

rbt.description: [m2 s ubar umol-1] Combined turbulance and boundary layer resistance for CO2 transport

ca.description: [ubar] CO2 partial pressure of the air

Na_dict.description: Parameters of the linear relationship between Nitrogen content per area and leaf mass per area according to Prieto et al. 2012 (doi: 10.1111/j.1365-3040.2012.02491.x)

aN.description: [gN gDM-1 °Cd-1] Slope of the linear relationship between leaf massic Nitrogen content and cumulative degree-days temperature

bN.description: [gN gDM-1] Intercept of the linear relationship between leaf massic Nitrogen content and cumulative degree-days temperature

aM.description: [gDM m-2 umol-1 m2 s] Slope of the linear relationship between leaf mass per area and the log of the cumulative photosynthetic photon flux density over the last 10 days

bM.description: [gDM m-2 umol-1 m2 s] Intercept of the linear relationship between leaf mass per area and the log of the cumulative photosynthetic photon flux density over the last 10 days

par_gs.description: Parameters of the stomatal conductance model

model.description: Model name for the response function of stomata to leaf water status

g0.description: [umol m-2 s-1] Residual stomatal conductance for CO2 at the light compensation point

m0.description: [umol mmol-1] Maximum slope An/gs (absence of water deficit)

psi0.description: [MPa] Critical thershold for leaf water potential regulating the reduction trend of stomatal conductance with the drop in leaf water potential

D0.description: [kPa] Shape parameter of the stomatal conductance model of Leuning (1995, PCE 18, 339–355)

n.description: [-] Shape parameter of the stomatal conductance model of Tuzet et al. (2003, PCE 26, 1097–1116) or Misson et al. (2004, Tree Physiol. 24, 529–541)

par_photo.description: Parameters of the photosynthetic capacity (before accounting for the effect of leaf N content

Vcm25.description: [umol m-2 s-1] Maximum RuBP-saturated rate of carboxylation

Jm25.description: [umol m-2 s-1] Maximum of electron transport rate

TPU25.description: [umol m-2 s-1] Maximum rate of triose phosphate transport

Kc25.description: [umol mol-1] Michaelis-Menten constant for the carboxylase

Ko25.description: [mmol mol-1] Michaelis-Menten constant for the oxygenase

Tx25.description: [umol mol-1] CO2 compensation point in the absence of mitochondrial respiration

RespT_Kc.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of Michaelis-Menten constant for the carboxylase

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

RespT_Ko.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of Michaelis-Menten constant for the oxygenase

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

RespT_Vcm.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of RuBP-saturated rate of carboxylation

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

RespT_Jm.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of electron transport rate

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

RespT_TPU.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of triose phosphate rate

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

RespT_Rd.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of mitochondrial respiration rate

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

RespT_Tx.description: Parameters for temperature response curve of CO2 compensation point in the absence of mitochondrial respiration

deltaHa.description: [kJ molCO2-1] Activation energy of the Arrhenius functions

dhd_inhib_beg.description: [KJ mol-1] value of enthalpy of deactivation at the begining of photoinhibition

dhd_inhib_max.description: [KJ mol-1] value of enthalpy of deactivation under maximum photoinhibition

psi_inhib_beg.description: [MPa] leaf water potential at which photoinhibition begins

psi_inhib_max.description: [MPa] leaf water potential at which photoinhibition is maximum

temp_inhib_beg.description: [°C] leaf temperature at which photoinhibition begins

temp_inhib_max.description: [°C] leaf temperature at which photoinhibition is maximum

par_photo_N.description: (slope, intercept) values of the linear relationship between photosynthetic capacity parameters (Vcmax, Jmax, TPU, Rd) and surface-based leaf Nitrogen content, according to Prieto et al. (2012, doi: 10.1111/j.1365-3040.2012.02491.x)

soil.description: Parameters of the soil water balance model

soil_class.description: Soil hydrodynamic class as proposed by Carsel and Parrish (1988) DOI: 10.1029/WR024i005p00755

soil_dimensions.description: [m] (inter-row spacing, intra-row spacing, effective root depth)

rhyzo_solution.description: Add rhyzosphere elements to the mtg
